verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, came אַחַר֙ <WH310> 'a-Char And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> ha-'El-leh, these חָ֥טְא֛וּ <WH2398> cha-te-'U had offended מַשְׁקֵ֥ה <WH4945> mash-Keh the cupbearer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- of the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וְהָאֹפֶ֑ה <WH644> ve-ha-'o-Peh; and [his] baker לַאֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH113> la-'a-do-nei-Hem their lord לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> le-Me-lech the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

[was] before me

וּבַגֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> u-vag-Ge-fen And in the vine שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> she-lo-Shah [were] three שָׂרִיגִ֑ם <WH8299> sa-ri-Gim; branches וְהִ֤יא <WH1931> ve-Hi it was כְפֹרַ֙חַת֙ <WH6524> che-fo-Ra-chat and it [was] as though it budded עָלְתָ֣ה <WH5927> 'al-Tah shot forth נִצָּ֔הּ <WH5322> nitz-Tzah, [and] her blossoms הִבְשִׁ֥ילוּ <WH1310> hiv-Shi-lu thereof brought forth ripe אַשְׁכְּלֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH811> 'ash-ke-lo-Tei-ha and the clusters עֲנָבִֽים׃ <WH6025> 'a-na-Vim. grapes
